titles.title: A resolution expressing the Senate's support for taking interim steps to strengthen the military interoperability and resiliency of the militaries of Finland and Sweden with respect to their anticipated accession to the North Atlantic Treaty Organization alliance.

A resolution expressing the Senate's support for taking interim steps to strengthen the military interoperability and resiliency of the militaries of Finland and Sweden with respect to their anticipated accession to the North Atlantic Treaty Organization alliance.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution supports, and calls for additional actions, to advance the interoperability of the Finnish and Swedish militaries with NATO forces.
